articles.title: All of the iPhone 17 models compared - TechCrunch
articles.description: All four of the devices will be available to preorder on Friday and will be available on September 19.
articles.content: Apple on Tuesday announced its iPhone 17 lineup, which consists of the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max. All four of the devices will be available to preorder on Friday … [+2439 chars]

articles.title: New black hole merger bolsters Hawking area theorem - Ars Technica
articles.description: Physicists spliced merger’s gravitational signal into isolated frequencies to determine surface areas.
